channel.title: Life on Ivan Klimchuk

item.title: Results and facts for 2014
item.description: I borrowed a note template from Artem Sapegin. So, some facts, events, and achievements in 2014: I figured out the DocPad generator and created my website in two languages. Also, I sent a couple of pull requests to DocPad itself.
